SEARCH

Class Main

java.lang.Object
Main
public class Main extends Object
Main class to run the application.

Reads the json files to create its database
Version:
1.0
Author:
Jacob Smith, Jaden Keeble, Mustafa Atoof, So Yoon Kim, Osama Yousef

    • encryptPassword

      public static String encryptPassword(String password, boolean encrypted)
      This method takes a password and either encrypts if it is not encrypted, or decrypts it if it is.
      Parameters:
      password - The password to be encrypted.
      encrypted - A boolean which checks whether the password is encrypted or not. If true, the password is instead decrypted.
      Returns:
      Either the encrypted or decrypted password.

      Searches for the text inputted in the search box among the building information.
      Parameters:
      searchInput - The keyword to be searched.
      Returns:
      The buildings with information that contained the keyword.

      Parameters:

    • addFavourite

      public static void addFavourite(int id) throws IOException, org.json.simple.parser.ParseException
      Method to take the id of an added favourite and update users.json
      Parameters:
      id - the id number of the new poi to add
      Throws:
      IOException - if the file name of the JSON file cannot be found
      org.json.simple.parser.ParseException - if the JSON parser cannot parse the file

    • createPOI

      public static void createPOI(POI p) throws IOException, org.json.simple.parser.ParseException
      Method to update users.json when a new poi is created
      Parameters:
      p - the new POI object to be added
      Throws:
      IOException - if the file name of the JSON file cannot be found
      org.json.simple.parser.ParseException - if the JSON parser cannot parse the file

    • saveBuilding

      public static void saveBuilding(String buildingImgPath) throws IOException, org.json.simple.parser.ParseException
      This method saves the new building's information in the json file Called after a user successfully creates a new building
      Parameters:
      buildingImgPath - string that holds the file path of the building image
      Throws:
      IOException - If the file name of the JSON cannot be found
      org.json.simple.parser.ParseException - If the JSON file cannot be parsed

    • deleteBuilding

      public static void deleteBuilding(Building toDelete) throws IOException, org.json.simple.parser.ParseException
      This method deletes a building entry from the json file when the user deletes a building
      Parameters:
      toDelete - Building object to delete
      Throws:
      IOException - If the JSON file cannot be found
      org.json.simple.parser.ParseException - If the JSon file cannot be parsed

    • recalculateBuildingPositions

      public static void recalculateBuildingPositions()
      This method calls the recalculateX method in building for each building to get new X positions

    • userHasPoi

      public static boolean userHasPoi(POI p)
      Method to detect if the current poi belongs to the user who is logged in or not
      Parameters:
      p - POI that is being checked
      Returns:
      true if the poi belongs to the current user

    • addPOItoUser

      public static void addPOItoUser(POI p)
      Method to add a new poi to the active user object
      Parameters:
      p - New POI to be added

    • removePOI

      public static void removePOI(int id) throws IOException, org.json.simple.parser.ParseException
      Method to remove a POI from a user's created POI's list Replaces the POI id with -1 to mark it for delete, so as not to change the order
      Parameters:
      id - Integer id of the POI to find and remove
      Throws:
      IOException - If the JSON file cannot be found
      org.json.simple.parser.ParseException - If the JSON parser cannot read the file

    • deleteFavourites

      public static void deleteFavourites(int id) throws IOException, org.json.simple.parser.ParseException
      Method to find and delete a favourite POI from users.json
      Parameters:
      id - Integer id of the id to find and delete
      Throws:
      IOException - If the JSON file cannot be found
      org.json.simple.parser.ParseException - If the JSON parser cannot read the file

    • saveJSON

      public static void saveJSON() throws IOException
      Method to update JSON file when a new user is created Rewrites the JSON file with the new user added to the JSONArray of users
      Throws:
      IOException - If the JSON file cannot be found
